title: New Deli Yoga Cafe Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, German
description: A vegetarian/vegan cafe and restaurant located inside a yoga studio. Serves innovative meals all made-in-house fresh to order, with no preservatives or flavor enhancers. Menu ranges from breakfast, lunch, green smoothies/juices to a changing selection of baked goods. Located close to Gorlitzer Park.
